name: specswarm
description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.3.8: CRITICAL FIX - skill directory names now match skill names (required for loading). v3.3.7: File permissions + auto-discovery. v3.3.6: Action-focused triggers. v3.3.5: EXTREMELY broad triggers. v3.3.4: Loose triggers + confirm.
